title: Mini chewy brownies
ingredients: ['200g (7oz) dark chocolate flavour cake covering', '125g (4 1/2oz) unsalted butter', '175g (6oz) caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '75g (2 1/2oz) plain white flour', '50g (2oz) mini fudge chunks', '50g (2oz) white/dark chocolate drops', '50g (2oz) milk chocolate drops']
